final_rubric.description: Rubric for evaluating assessments based on specified criteria.

performance_levels.Clear: Provides a clear and concise description of the assessment task.
performance_levels.Detailed: Provides a detailed description of the assessment task.
performance_levels.Vague: Provides a vague description of the assessment task; generic criteria may be generated.

scoring_guide.individual_score_description: Each criterion is scored based on the performance level achieved.
scoring_guide.weighted_score_description: The weighted score for each criterion is calculated by multiplying the criterion's weight by the performance level score.
scoring_guide.total_score_description: The total score is the sum of the weighted scores for all criteria.

final_rubric.note: Provide the target assessment modality, natural language description, and optional style preference to generate the rubric.
